description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) involve building systems that can perceive, reason, learn, and act autonomously or assist humans in decision-making.
why: AI/ML powers innovations like chatbots, recommendation engines, self-driving cars, and more. It's a rapidly growing field with applications across industries.
roadmap: Learn Python and math basics (linear algebra, probability, statistics)
Understand supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning
Explore data preprocessing and feature engineering
Study core ML algorithms (regression, classification, clustering)
Dive into deep learning (neural networks, CNNs, RNNs)
Explore computer vision (image recognition, object detection)
Experiment with AI projects (chatbots, image classifiers, etc.)
Learn about AI ethics and responsible AI
